titleStmt.title: Zayde a Spanish history, or, romance / originally written in French by Monsieur Segray ; done into English by P. Porter, Esq.
Zaïde. English
titleStmt.author: La Fayette, Madame de (Marie-Madeleine Pioche de La Vergne), 1634-1693.
Segrais, Jean Regnauld de, 1624-1701.
Porter, P.

notesStmt.note: Written by Comtesse de Lafayette with the assistance of Segrais.
Imperfect: second part lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
